text: Mateusz Kowalczyk and Artem Sitak were the defending champions, but chose not to participate this year. Rohan Bopanna and Florin Mergea won the title, defeating Alexander Peya and Bruno Soares in the final 5–7, 6–2, [10–7]. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== ==External links== * Main draw Stuttgart Doubles Doubles 2015
title: 2015 MercedesCup – Doubles
